title: man detective: medium-dark skin tone
category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
description: The Male Sleuth, Type-5 emoji is a sequence of the  Sleuth or Spy,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-5, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selec
apple_vendor_description: This detective emoji on Apple devices features a man with medium-dark skin, exuding an air of mystery and keen observation.  He's depicted wearing a classic trench coat and fedora, with subtle shading and realistic lighting that give the attire a tangible feel, characteristic of Apple's 3D design.  The focused expression and the overall polished look convey intelligence, problem-solving, and the pursuit of clues, making it perfect for discussions involving investigation or deduction.
